_docs.WHAT: English (US) locale settings for the Lex bot
_docs.WHY: Defines language, voice, and AI enhancement settings for this locale

KEY_SETTINGS.voiceId: Ruth - AWS Polly voice used for text-to-speech
KEY_SETTINGS.engine: generative - most natural-sounding, uses neural TTS
KEY_SETTINGS.nluIntentConfidenceThreshold: 0.40 - minimum confidence to match an intent (lower = more lenient)

_docs.GENERATIVE_AI: Enables Bedrock-powered improvements for slot resolution and utterance generation
_docs.HOW_TO_CHANGE_VOICE: Options include Joanna, Matthew, Ivy, Kendra, etc. 'generative' engine only works with select voices.

description: English (US) locale for Census Enumerator Bot

generativeAISettings._docs: Uses Claude to improve slot filling accuracy and auto-generate training utterances
